colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SHING YOS LO MGO ZLA BA'I NAD GZA' SKAR PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG BSTUN ^RJE BTZUN BSTAN PA'I 'KHOR LO DANG DBYANGS CAN LHA MO GNYIS LA BSNYEN MTSAMS BGYIS SKABS, YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA RJE ZHAL SNGA NAS BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS LHAG PA'I LHA MCHOG 'DI RNAMS LA BSTOD PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GSUNG GIS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS GZIMS CHUNG BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU NA TSOD DANG BSTUN GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
